category.name: Thin Client.Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MEIdGenerationAllowDuplicates
preference.preference_description: Allows duplicate values for IDs generated for BOM line properties based on the value of the MEIdGenerationPropertySetting preference. Valid Values: true - The value of the property created by the recipe found in the MEIdGenerationPropertySetting preference must not be unique. false - The value of the property created by the recipe found in the MEIdGenerationPropertySetting preference must be unique.
